long_description: The versatile Patagonia Boaris 2.0 shoes offer up all-terrain capability with a touch of sneaker style for your lively, everyday jaunts and endeavors. Soft and supple, pigskin and oiled nubuck leather uppers are sourced from tanneries that strive to minimize harmful effects on the environment caused by their activities. Polyester mesh linings provide excellent moisture wicking performance for great comfort. EVA and recycled EVA make up the midsoles, which absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support; cushioning units in the heels reduce impact force from heel strikes. Nylon arch shanks deliver stability and support underfoot. Low-profile Vibram(R) rubber outsoles provide lightweight performance without compromising on grip or stability. Outsoles are stitched onto uppers, minimizing the need for solvents and adhesives.
short_description: The versatile Patagonia Boaris 2.0 shoes offer up all-terrain capability with a touch of sneaker style for your lively, everyday jaunts and endeavors.
